spans: Ways to improve interpersonal skills: Take courses on or practice traits such as active listening and empathy. Observe other employees' interpersonal interactions or work with a mentor on this skill. Maintain eye contact and be aware of body language during meetings and conversations.

clueweb22-en0021-01-09375.point_content: Communication skills can be improved by talking face-to-face, listening closely, asking questions, practicing what to say, and paying attention to body language.
spans: Ways to improve verbal and nonverbal communication: To improve communication skills, talk to coworkers face-to-face when possible, listen closely when they speak and ask questions. Practice what you are going to say before you say it if needed. Pay attention to body language and adjust your communication style accordingly.

clueweb22-en0021-01-09375.point_content: Writing skills can be improved by studying company style guides, using spelling and grammar checkers, and asking colleagues or managers to review and provide feedback.
spans: Ways to improve writing skills: Study the company style guide for communications and written content if available, install a free spelling and grammar checker to find writing mistakes, ask a colleague or manager to proof or review content and offer feedback on how to improve it.

clueweb22-en0021-01-09375.point_content: Accepting feedback can be improved by practicing listening, asking questions, maintaining a calm attitude, and thanking the person giving feedback.
spans: Ways to improve feedback acceptance: Practice listening and ask questions about how you can improve, maintain a calm attitude and facial expression, practice a “matter-of-fact” mindset instead of feeling defeated or angry. Thank the person who gives you the feedback, regardless of whether you agree with them.

clueweb22-en0021-01-09375.point_content: Organization skills can be improved by creating daily schedules, maintaining a clean work environment, using digital records, and creating electronic filing systems.
spans: Ways to improve organization: Create a schedule each day that lists the things you need to do and in what order. Create a clean work environment to avoid losing documents or to-do lists in piles of paperwork. Use digital records and daily organizers to reduce the amount of paper to manage. Create electronic filing systems for all projects to quickly and easily access them when needed.

clueweb22-en0021-01-09375.point_content: Flexibility can be improved by accepting various projects, learning new skills, and practicing ways to remain calm when plans change.
spans: Ways to improve flexibility: Show a willingness to accept a variety of projects or assignments. Show interest in learning additional skills and practice ways to remain calm when plans change suddenly.

clueweb22-en0021-01-09375.point_content: Problem-solving skills can be improved by observing coworkers, reflecting on past problems, remaining calm, and collaborating with others.
spans: Ways to improve problem-solving skills: Watch coworkers you respect to see how they resolve issues in the workplace. After experiencing a problem, think through ways you might have handled it differently and take note for next time. Remain calm and collaborate with others, relying on people who may have skills you don’t.

clueweb22-en0030-53-13206.point_content: Knowing the company and the job description helps with this answer. Honestly evaluating yourself, then comparing what needs to improve to the job requirements will help formulate a strong answer for this question.
spans: Knowing the company and the job description helps with this answer.  Honestly evaluating yourself, then comparing what needs to improve to the job requirements will help formulate a strong answer for this question.

clueweb22-en0030-53-13206.point_content: The key is to mention skills that need moderate improvement, the current weakness won’t negatively impact the job, improvement will help the job, and there is a plan to improve.
spans: The key is to mention skills that need moderate improvement, the current weakness won’t negatively impact the job, improvement will help the job, and there is a plan to improve.

clueweb22-en0018-71-15223.point_content: Identify areas for improvement by taking responsibility for where you fell short and focusing on steps to correct these in the future.
spans: Identify areas for improvement

Being critical of your own performance is difficult, but we all go off track at times. Take responsibility for areas where you fell short, but focus on the steps you took or can take to correct these in future.

clueweb22-en0018-71-15223.point_content: Example of an area needing more focus: improving familiarity with tools to avoid issues in meetings.
spans: At the beginning of the year, some of our meetings went off course because I wasn't familiar enough with the conferencing tools to troubleshoot when things weren't working. I met with IT to get a better understanding of our software suite and was able to fix the most recent issues myself, and help other team members to do the same.

clueweb22-en0018-71-15223.point_content: Example of an area needing more focus: improving time management to follow up with leads.
spans: I have let some lead nurturing fall through the cracks the last few months because of the volume of new clients I've taken on. Going forward I will improve my time management and set aside a dedicated half hour a day to follow up with warm leads.

clueweb22-en0018-71-15223.point_content: Suggest areas for professional development to close skills gaps and discuss with your manager how to address them.
spans: Suggest areas for professional development

Everybody has skills that they can develop further, and organizations often have programmes in place to support these. The performance review is a great time to bring up skills gaps you want to close and to discuss with your manager how to go about that.

clueweb22-en0018-71-15223.point_content: Example of professional development focus: improving design skills and knowledge of UI best practices through courses and conferences.
spans: Next year I want to improve my design skills and knowledge of UI best practices. I've researched a couple of available courses and conferences where I'd learn not only the tools I need but would be able to hear new ideas and collaborate with other developers, bringing those skills back to the organization.

clueweb22-en0018-71-15223.point_content: Example of professional development focus: developing leadership skills and becoming a mentor through coaching workshops and courses.
spans: As our business grows I want to develop myself as a leader and become a mentor to my team members. Through coaching workshops and organizational psychology courses I will gain a broader knowledge of what motivates people and how I can work to get the best out of our collective talent.
